TopicTitle: [1.12.X] Tantares - Stockalike Soyuz and MIR [16.1][28.05.2024][{Proton Revamp]

Articles.Content: Regarding your earlier question, no, I don't use RT, but it might be a bug with TweakableEverything. I did some config edits adding Firespitter animation modules, and that works.
I have updated everything to 0.90. Whole hour without a crash. Only thing is, now all of Tantares pods lost EVA ability... There are no portraits to click ;/ Stock ones work fine.

Regarding your earlier question, no, I don't use RT, but it might be a bug with TweakableEverything. I did some config edits adding Firespitter animation modules, and that works.

I would guess it really is a TweakableEverything problem then...

Hmmm, thanks for bringing this to my attention, I should have a closer look.

I have updated everything to 0.90. Whole hour without a crash. Only thing is, now all of Tantares pods lost EVA ability... There are no portraits to click ;/ Stock ones work fine.

Yeah, IVAs are temporarily scrapped while I re-do them. For now, just click the doors of the pods to do EVA etc

(Although the Gemini and ATV should have IVAs)

For now, just click the doors

Playing since 0.20. Never tried to click a bloody door before.

Thank you for pointing that for me Everything works dandy now. Cheers

Playing since 0.20. Never tried to click a bloody door before.
But... "Crew Hatch" label shows half the time you point to the pod with your mouse... How could not you see that?!

Also:

Yeah - I am really busy, and will be for a while. As I struggle with the LK leg, do people have interest in LK beta without legs for now (I'm just cleaning up the engine).

And the legs can be "figured out" before final release.

Actually many many thanks to Lo-Fi who has been great help with the legs so far - almost they are working!

Yeah - I am really busy, and will be for a while.

Focus on school so that you can be Bachelor Bread or Master Bread.

The stock legs are mediocre, but they are good enough for now.

Focus on school so that you can be Bachelor Bread or Master Bread.

The stock legs are mediocre, but they are good enough for now.

Master Bread hopefully followed by Dr. Bread

But yes, people may not expect so much progress for ~ 2 months. I still enjoy to work on Tantares on evenings when I can, so it's not a dead stop in development (thankfully).

I was going to consider a dual-mode engine, to have the same backup functionality the LK had, but given the circumstances, that doesn't make sense (no stock engine failures). So I gave it RCS jets.

Me Gusta. Looks like something I could use for a upper stage engine. Not only could I boost my payload higher, but I could fine tune my orbit with the RCS.

Also, how do sentient bread feel about toasters?
Toasters....

I've decided to do some deep space exploring with Tantares. Our ship, the Aurora:

From left to right: the Kerbin reentry pod (it's probably being blasted with radiation, but hey! Don't even worry about it!). Then the main crew cabins and nuclear propulsion systems, with plentiful space for the crew. Toast your marshmallows on the radiation! At the very front of the ship, the expendable atmospheric lander.

To Duna!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I've decided to do some deep space exploring with Tantares. Our ship, the Aurora:

http://i.imgur.com/CR9tUIH.png

From left to right: the Kerbin reentry pod (it's probably being blasted with radiation, but hey! Don't even worry about it!). Then the main crew cabins and nuclear propulsion systems, with plentiful space for the crew. Toast your marshmallows on the radiation! At the very front of the ship, the expendable atmospheric lander.

To Duna!

http://imgur.com/a/0rpKJ

This is one of the best Tantares-made interplanetary ship I've ever seen!

I just finished updating all my mods for .90 after a while out of the game - about half of the crewed Tantares command / utility modules seem to have an IVA, and about half of them don't. That is, there's not even an IVA window on the bottom right, and pressing C does nothing, even though there are Kerbals inside. I also have RPM installed and working with stock command modules and most other mods, but for some reason, none of the working modules have RPM. I think they may be related? Is this a known issue? (Disappearing IVA with some sort of RPM incompatibility issue?) I tried deleting Tantares_Extra_RasterIVA and renaming internal_basic to internal (and removing the original internal) in all the spaces, thinking if I got rid of the RPM internals they might work again, but that doesn't seem to have had any effect.

https://galorndoncore.files.wordpress.com/2010/01/cylon-vs-cylon-violence1.jpg

Toasters....

I used to be one of those toasters but then I converted over to the Cylon hybrid model. Being a hybrid needs oxygen though but hey, nothing like a good cup of tea and a toasted slice of bread in the morning ...anyways, I'm now interested how the new LK's interior will look like. I mean bigger main view port and a smaller upper view port. It'll be fun landing stuff in IVA with that!

Celine, due to a recent major overhaul of Tantares, there are no IVA's for the majority of the pods. Beale, maybe this needs to be made more obvious as people are not checking the thread history to resolve issues...

Hay Beale!

Once again thanks for such an awesome mod pack! I decided to track down the work you did on Zenit/Energia/Vulkan parts in order to fill a heavy lifting void in my ongoing series (found Here). It was surprisingly difficult to find and I was wondering if you might put a link to it on the front page or in your signature somewhere so others can find it easier. Anyway great work on the new LK!

-Foxx

This is one of the best Tantares-made interplanetary ship I've ever seen!

Well thank you! It was a fun mission.
